steps.run: touch add.txt && rm README.md && echo "TEST" > LICENSE && git add -A

modified:

steps.run: touch add.txt && rm README.md && echo "TEST" > LICENSE && git add -A

with.filters:
added:
  - added: "add.txt"
deleted:
  - deleted: "README.md"
modified:
  - modified: "LICENSE"
any:
  - added|deleted|modified: "*"

steps.name: filter-test
steps.if:
steps.filter.outputs.added != 'true'
|| steps.filter.outputs.deleted != 'true'
|| steps.filter.outputs.modified != 'true'
|| steps.filter.outputs.any != 'true'
|| steps.filter.outputs.added_files != '''add.txt'''
|| steps.filter.outputs.modified_files != '''LICENSE'''
|| steps.filter.outputs.deleted_files != '''README.md'''

steps.name: configure GIT user
steps.run: git config user.email "john@nowhere.local" && git config user.name "John Doe"

steps.name: modify working tree
steps.run: touch add.txt && rm README.md && echo "TEST" > LICENSE

steps.name: commit changes
steps.run: git add -A && git commit -a -m 'testing this action'

with.filters:
added:
  - added: "add.txt"
deleted:
  - deleted: "README.md"
modified:
  - modified: "LICENSE"
any:
  - added|deleted|modified: "*"

steps.name: filter-test
steps.if:
steps.filter.outputs.added != 'true'
|| steps.filter.outputs.deleted != 'true'
|| steps.filter.outputs.modified != 'true'
|| steps.filter.outputs.any != 'true'
|| steps.filter.outputs.added_files != '''add.txt'''
|| steps.filter.outputs.modified_files != '''LICENSE'''
|| steps.filter.outputs.deleted_files != '''README.md'''
